description.english: Decided Lincoln's fate
description.german: Wähle Lincolns Schicksal
description.french: Vous avez choisi le destin de Lincoln.
description.italian: Hai deciso il destino di Lincoln
description.spanish: Has decidido el destino de Lincoln
description.schinese: 决定林肯的命运
description.tchinese: 決定林肯的命運
description.russian: Вы решили судьбу Линкольна
description.japanese: リンカーンの運命を決める
description.polish: Zadecydowałeś o losie Lincolna.
description.brazilian: Decidiu o destino de Lincoln.

description.english: You hung Ritchie Doucet from a Ferris wheel
description.german: Hänge Ritchie Doucet am Riesenrad auf
description.french: Vous avez pendu Ritchie Doucet du haut de la grande roue.
description.italian: Hai appeso Ritchie Doucet alla ruota panoramica
description.spanish: Has colgado a Ritchie Doucet de la noria
description.schinese: 把里奇·多塞特吊死在摩天轮上
description.tchinese: 把瑞奇·杜雪在摩天輪上吊死
description.russian: Вы повесили Ричи Даусета на колесе обозрения
description.japanese: リッチー ドゥーセを観覧車に吊るす
description.polish: Powiesiłeś Ritchego Douceta na diabelskim młynie.
description.czech: Oběsil jsi Ritchieho Douceta na ruském kole
description.brazilian: Você enforcou o Ritchie Doucet na roda-gigante.

description.english: You turned the Butcher over to Burke
description.german: Händige Burke den Schlachter aus
description.french: Vous avez livré le Boucher à Burke.
description.italian: Hai consegnato il Macellaio a Burke
description.spanish: Has entregado al Carnicero a Burke
description.schinese: 把屠夫交给伯克
description.tchinese: 把屠夫交給博克
description.russian: Вы сдали Мясника Берку
description.japanese: ブッチャーをバークに引き渡す
description.polish: Oddałeś „Rzeźnika” w ręce Burke'a.
description.brazilian: Você entregou o Açougueiro para o Burke.

description.english: You helped Vito capture Michael Grecco
description.german: Hilf Vito, Michael Grecco zu fangen
description.french: Vous avez aidé Vito à capturer Michael Grecco.
description.italian: Hai aiutato Vito a catturare Michael Grecco
description.koreana: 비토가 마이클 그레코를 잡는 것을 도우십시오
description.spanish: Has ayudado a Vito a capturar a Michael Grecco
description.schinese: 帮维托抓住迈克尔·格雷科
description.tchinese: 幫助維托抓住邁可·葛樂寇
description.russian: Вы помогли Вито поймать Майкла Грекко
description.japanese: ヴィトがマイケル グレコを捕えるのに協力する
description.polish: Pomogłeś Vitowi schwytać Michaela Grecca.
description.czech: Pomohl jsi Vitovi zajmout Michaela Grecca
description.brazilian: Você ajudou o Vito na captura do Michael Grecco.

description.english: You tossed Derazio out his penthouse window
description.german: Wirf Derazio aus seinem Penthouse-Fenster
description.french: Vous avez jeté Derazio par la fenêtre de son appartement de luxe.
description.italian: Hai lanciato Derazio fuori dalla finestra del suo attico
description.koreana: 데라지오를 그의 펜트하우스 창문 밖으로 던지십시오
description.spanish: Has tirado a Derazio por la ventana de su ático
description.schinese: 把迪拉佐从他公寓的窗子里扔出去
description.tchinese: 把德拉齊歐從頂樓套房扔出去
description.russian: Вы выбросили Дерацио из окна пентхауса
description.japanese: デラツィオをペントハウスの窓から投げ落す
description.polish: Wyrzuciłeś Derazia przez okno jego penthouse'u.
description.czech: Prohodil jsi Derazia oknem jeho apartmánu
description.brazilian: Você jogou o Derazio pela janela da cobertura.

displayName.japanese: 俺はリンカーン クレイだ

description.english: You jammed a knife through Santangelo's head
description.german: Ramme ein Messer in Santangelos Kopf
description.french: Vous avez poignardé Santangelo.
description.italian: Hai infilato un coltello in testa a Santangelo
description.spanish: Has metido un cuchillo en la cabeza de Santangelo
description.schinese: 把刀插入圣安吉洛的脑袋
description.tchinese: 把刀插進山坦傑洛的頭
description.russian: Вы засадили нож в голову Сантанжело
description.japanese: サンタンジェロの頭にナイフを突き刺す
description.polish: Przeszyłeś nożem głowę Santangela.
description.czech: Vrazil jsi nůž Santangelovi do hlavy
description.brazilian: Você enfiou uma faca na cabeça do Santangelo.

description.english: You helped Enzo escape
description.german: Hilf Enzo bei der Flucht
description.french: Vous avez aidé Enzo à s'échapper.
description.italian: Hai aiutato Enzo a scappare
description.spanish: Has ayudado a Enzo a escapar
description.schinese: 帮助恩佐逃脱
description.tchinese: 幫助安佐逃跑
description.russian: Вы помогли Энцо скрыться
description.japanese: エンツォの脱出に手を貸す
description.polish: Pomogłeś Enzowi w ucieczce.
description.brazilian: Você ajudou o Enzo a escapar.

description.english: You killed Judge Holden
description.german: Erledige Richter Holden
description.french: Vous avez tué le Juge Holden.
description.italian: Hai ucciso il giudice Holden
description.spanish: Has matado al juez Holden
description.schinese: 杀了霍顿法官
description.tchinese: 你殺死了霍頓法官
description.russian: Вы убили судью Холдена
description.japanese: ホールデン判事を始末する
description.polish: Zabiłeś Judge'a Holdena.
description.brazilian: Você matou o juiz Holden.

description.english: Tommy Marcano was burned beyond recognition
description.german: Verbrenne Tommy Marcano bis zur Unkenntlichkeit
description.french: Tommy Marcano fait partie des grands brûlés.
description.italian: Tommy Marcano è così carbonizzato da non essere riconoscibile
description.koreana: 토미 마르카노를 알아볼 수 없을 정도로 그을리십시오
description.spanish: Has hecho que Tommy Marcano ardiera hasta quedar irreconocible
description.schinese: 把汤米·马尔卡诺烧得面目全非
description.tchinese: 把湯彌·馬卡諾燒得面目全非
description.russian: Томми Маркано обгорел до неузнаваемости
description.japanese: トミー マルカーノを火あぶりにする
description.polish: Spaliłeś Tommy'ego Marcano tak, że rodzona matka nie rozpozna jego szczątków.
description.czech: Tommy Marcano byl spálen k nepoznání
description.brazilian: Tommy Marcano foi carbonizado até ficar irreconhecível.

description.english: You left Olivia Marcano to her fate
description.german: Überlasse Olivia Marcano ihrem Schicksal
description.french: Vous avez abandonné Olivia Marcano à son sort.
description.italian: Hai lasciato Olivia Marcano al suo destino
description.spanish: Has abandonado a Olivia Marcano a su destino
description.schinese: 留下奥利维亚·马尔卡诺等死
description.tchinese: 留下歐莉維亞等死
description.russian: Вы оставили Оливию Маркано на произвол судьбы
description.japanese: オリヴィア マルカーノを運命にゆだねる
description.polish: Pozostawiłeś Olivię Marcano, aby jej los sam się dopełnił.
description.czech: Nechal jsi Olivii Marcanovou jejímu osudu
description.brazilian: Você deixou Olivia Marcano à mercê do destino.

description.english: You have avenged Sammy and Ellis
description.german: Räche Sammy und Ellis
description.french: Vous avez vengé Sammy et Ellis.
description.italian: Hai vendicato Sammy e Ellis
description.spanish: Has vengado a Sammy y a Ellis
description.schinese: 为萨米和埃利斯复仇
description.tchinese: 替山米和艾利斯復仇
description.russian: Вы отомстили за Сэмми и Эллиса
description.japanese: サミーとエリスの復讐を果たす
description.polish: Pomściłeś Sammy'ego i Ellisa.
description.brazilian: Você vingou as mortes de Sammy e Ellis.

displayName.italian: È una cosa che devo fare

description.english: You collected your things from Sammy's
description.german: Hole deine Sachen aus Sammys Bar
description.french: Vous avez récupéré votre matériel chez Sammy.
description.italian: Hai recuperato le tue cose al bar di Sammy
description.spanish: Has recogido tus cosas en el bar de Sammy
description.schinese: 从萨米那取回你的东西
description.tchinese: 在山米酒吧收拾你的東西
description.russian: Вы забрали свои вещи из бара Сэмми
description.japanese: サミーの店で自分の所持品を集める
description.polish: Zabrałeś swoje rzeczy od Sammy'ego.
description.czech: Došel sis pro věci do Sammyho baru
description.brazilian: Você pegou seus pertences no Sammy's.

description.english: Cassandra agreed to help you kill Marcano

description.french: Cassandra a accepté de vous aider à tuer Marcano.
description.italian: Cassandra ha accettato di aiutarti a uccidere Marcano

description.polish: Cassandra zgodziła się pomóc ci w zabiciu Marcana.
description.czech: Cassandra souhlasila, že ti pomůže zabít Marcana

displayName.tchinese: 愛爾蘭共和軍從不求人

description.english: Saved $150,000 between your wallet and the bank
description.german: Spare insgesamt 150.000 $ in deiner Geldbörse und Bank
description.french: Vous avez amassé 150 000 $, entre votre portefeuille et la banque.
description.italian: Hai accumulato 150.000 dollari tra portafogli e deposito
description.spanish: Has ahorrado 150 000 dólares entre tu cartera y el banco
description.schinese: 钱包与银行共计达到 150,000 美元
description.tchinese: 錢包與銀行存款總額達到 $150,000
description.russian: Вы накопили $150,000 в кошельке и в сейфе
description.japanese: 所持金と預金併せて$150,000にする
description.polish: Zgromadziłeś w portfelu i banku łączną sumę 150 000 $.
description.brazilian: Juntou $150.000 entre sua carteira e o banco.

displayName.german: Baby, du bist ein reicher Mann
displayName.japanese: ヘイ、 景気がいいな
displayName.brazilian: Cara, você é um homem rico

description.english: Earned $500,000
description.german: Verdiene 500.000 $
description.french: Vous avez amassé 500 000 $.
description.italian: Hai guadagnato 500.000 dollari
description.spanish: Has ganado 500 000 dólares
description.russian: Вы заработали $500,000
description.polish: Ustukałeś 500 000 $
description.brazilian: Recebeu $500.000.

description.english: Got the maximum earn from one of your Rackets
description.german: Erhalte bei einem deiner Geschäfte den maximalen Verdienst
description.french: Vous avez obtenu le maximum d'argent pour l'un des trafics.
description.italian: Hai ricevuto il guadagno massimo da uno dei tuoi racket
description.spanish: Has conseguido ganar el máximo con uno de tus negocios
description.schinese: 从一个据点赚取最大化利润
description.tchinese: 從一樁生意賺取最大利潤
description.russian: Вы получили максимальный заработок с одного из ваших бизнесов
description.japanese: いずれかのビジネスから最大限の収入を獲得する
description.polish: Wycisnąłeś maksymalny zysk z jednej ze swoich organizacji przestępczych.
description.czech: Vytěžen maximální zisk z jedné z vlastních operací
description.brazilian: Conseguiu o lucro máximo com um de seus esquemas.

description.english: Kept all Underbosses alive until "Yet Here We Are"
description.german: Halte alle deine Unterbosse bis "Und doch sind wir hier" am Leben
description.french: Vous avez gardé tous les colonels en vie jusqu'à "Et pourtant, c'est fait".
description.italian: Hai tenuto in vita tutti i Generali fino a ''Eppure eccoci qui''
description.koreana: 미션 "결국 이런 상황이 됐군" 전까지 모든 부두목이 살아남게 하십시오
description.spanish: Has mantenido con vida a todos tus subjefes hasta "Pero aquí estamos"
description.schinese: 确保所有副手存活，直到任务“事已至此”
description.tchinese: 確保所有副手存活直到任務「事已至此」
description.russian: Вы не дали ни одному из ваших подручных погибнуть до начала задания "Но все обернулось иначе"
description.japanese: 「ついにここまで」まで腹心全員を生存させる
description.polish: Zatrzymałeś przy życiu wszystkich podległych ci bossów, aż do rozdziału „A jednak do tego doszło”.
description.czech: Všichni pobočníci ponecháni naživu až do „A přesto jsme tu“
description.brazilian: Manteve todos os subchefes vivos até "E aqui estamos".

description.english: Kept only one Underboss alive until "Yet Here We Are"
description.german: Halte nur einen deiner Unterbosse bis "Und doch sind wir hier" am Leben
description.french: Vous avez gardé seulement un colonel en vie jusqu'à "Et pourtant, c'est fait".
description.italian: Hai tenuto in vita un solo Generale fino a ''Eppure eccoci qui''
description.koreana: 미션 "결국 이런 상황이 됐군" 전까지 오직 한 명의 부두목만 살아남게 하십시오
description.spanish: Has mantenido con vida a uno solo de tus subjefes hasta "Pero aquí estamos"
description.schinese: 确保只有一位副手存活，直到任务“事已至此”
description.tchinese: 只讓一名副手存活直到任務「事已至此」
description.russian: Вы оставили только одного из ваших подручных в живых до начала задания "Но все обернулось иначе"
description.japanese: 「ついにここまで」まで腹心を1人だけ生かしておく
description.polish: Zatrzymałeś przy życiu tylko jednego podległego ci bossa, aż do rozdz. „A jednak do tego doszło”.
description.czech: Jen jeden pobočník ponechán naživu až do „A přesto jsme tu“
description.brazilian: Manteve apenas um subchefe vivo até "E aqui estamos".

description.english: Reached the Loyal state with one Underboss
description.german: Verdiene dir die Loyalität von einem deiner Unterbosse
description.french: Vous avez gagné la loyauté d'un de vos colonels.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto il livello ''Leale'' con un Generale
description.koreana: 한 명의 부두목을 충성스러운 상태로 만드십시오
description.spanish: Has conseguido que uno de tus subjefes te sea leal
description.schinese: 一位副手达到忠诚阶段
description.tchinese: 與 1 名副手達到忠誠程度
description.russian: Вы добились преданности одного из ваших подручных
description.japanese: いずれかの腹心が「忠実」になる
description.polish: Sprawiłeś, że jeden z podległych ci bossów stał się wobec ciebie lojalny.
description.brazilian: Ganhou a confiança de um dos subchefes.

description.english: Reached the Loyal state with all three Underbosses
description.german: Verdiene dir die Loyalität von allen drei Unterbossen
description.french: Vous avez gagné la loyauté des trois colonels.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto il livello ''Leale'' con tutti e tre i Generali
description.koreana: 세 명의 부두목을 모두 충성스러운 상태로 만드십시오
description.spanish: Has conseguido que tus tres subjefes te sean leales
description.schinese: 三个副手都达到忠诚阶段
description.tchinese: 與 3 名副手均達到忠誠程度
description.russian: Вы добились преданности всех троих подручных
description.japanese: 腹心全員が「忠実」になる
description.polish: Sprawiłeś, że cała trójka podległych ci bossów stała się wobec ciebie lojalna.
description.czech: Dosažena loajalita u všech tří pobočníků
description.brazilian: Ganhou a confiança dos três subchefes.

description.english: Spent at least $500,000
description.german: Gib mindestens 500.000 $ aus
description.french: Vous avez dépensé au moins 500 000 $.
description.italian: Hai speso almeno 500.000 dollari
description.spanish: Has gastado al menos 500 000 dólares
description.schinese: 花掉至少 500,000 美元
description.russian: Вы потратили $500,000
description.polish: Wydałeś co najmniej 500 000 $.
description.brazilian: Gastou, no mínimo, $5000.000.

description.english: Received $10,000 in earn from one Underboss
description.german: Verdiene 10.000 $ von einem deiner Unterbosse
description.french: Vous avez gagné 10 000 $ par le biais d'un des colonels.
description.italian: Hai ricevuto 10.000 dollari in guadagni da uno dei tuoi Generali
description.koreana: 한 명의 부두목으로부터 10,000 달러의 수익을 받으십시오
description.spanish: Has recibido 10 000 dólares de ganancias de uno de tus subjefes
description.schinese: 从一位副手手上赚取 10,000 美元
description.tchinese: 從 1 名副手處賺取 $10,000
description.russian: Вы получили $10,000 заработка с одного из ваших подручных
description.japanese: いずれかの腹心から$10,000の取り分をもらう
description.polish: Zarobiłeś 10 000 $ od jednego z podległych ci bossów.
description.brazilian: Recebeu $10.000 de pagamento de um subchefe.

description.english: Flipped 16 Racket Bosses
description.german: Wirb 16 Geschäftsbosse an
description.french: Vous avez recruté 16 boss de trafics.
description.italian: Hai reclutato 16 boss dei racket
description.spanish: Has reclutado a 16 jefes de negocios
description.schinese: 招募 16 名据点头目
description.tchinese: 招募 16 名小頭目

description.japanese: 元締めを16人寝返らせる
description.polish: Przeciągnąłeś na swoją stronę 16 bossów organizacji przestępczych.
description.brazilian: Recrutou 16 chefes de esquemas.

description.english: Recruited 15 Racket Informants
description.german: Rekrutiere 15 Geschäftsinformanten
description.french: Vous avez recruté 15 informateurs de trafics.

description.tchinese: 招募 15 名提供情報的線民
description.russian: Вы завербовали 15 информаторов
description.japanese: ビジネスの情報持ち15人を配下にする
